name: KUNAI
description:
A traumatic event has shaken the balance of the world.
Human life has mostly been wiped out.
Robots roam free across earth.
You are one of them.A NINJA METROIDVANIA
In KUNAI, you take control of Tabby the tablet. An elite kunai wielding robot fused with ancient warrior souls.
Use your KUNAI and ninja parkour skills to traverse the world of ruin, and find your true purpose in an immersive METROIDVANIA game world.
EXPLORE a world filled with secrets, hidden passages and mysterious characters. Use your ninja mobility to reach places where no normal robot could ever go!
FIGHT your way through armies of evil Machines, rogue androids and mindless mechs! A deadly arsenal of weapons is at your disposal, you're going to need it..
BEFRIEND various allies to help you fight against the armies of evil. Some might look a bit strange, but know that their mechanical hearts are in the right place!
